info: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC,making it over 2000 years old.Richard McClintock,a Latin professor at Hampden - Sydney College in Virginia,looked up one of the more obscure Latin words
